016package io.micronaut.maven.jib;
017
018import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.buildplan.*;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.buildplan.UnixPathParser;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.JibMavenPluginExtension;
021import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.MavenData;
022import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.plugins.extension.ExtensionLogger;
023import io.micronaut.core.util.StringUtils;
024import io.micronaut.maven.core.DockerBuildStrategy;
025import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
026import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
027import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
028
029import java.util.*;
030
031/**
032 * Jib extension to support building Docker images.
033 *
034 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
035 * @since 1.1
036 */
037public class JibMicronautExtension implements JibMavenPluginExtension<Void> {
038
039    public static final String DEFAULT_JAVA17_BASE_IMAGE = "eclipse-temurin:17-jre";
040    public static final String DEFAULT_JAVA21_BASE_IMAGE = "eclipse-temurin:21-jre";
041    private static final String LATEST_TAG = "latest";
042    private static final String JDK_VERSION = "maven.compiler.target";
043
044    @Override
045    public Optional<Class<Void>> getExtraConfigType() {
046        return Optional.empty();
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public ContainerBuildPlan extendContainerBuildPlan(ContainerBuildPlan buildPlan, Map<String, String> properties,
051                                                       Optional<Void> extraConfig, MavenData mavenData,
052                                                       ExtensionLogger logger) {
053
054        ContainerBuildPlan.Builder builder = buildPlan.toBuilder();
055        MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(mavenData.getMavenProject().getProperties().getProperty(MicronautRuntime.PROPERTY, "none").toUpperCase());
056
057        JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService = new JibConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
058
059        String baseImage = buildPlan.getBaseImage();
060        if (StringUtils.isEmpty(buildPlan.getBaseImage())) {
061            baseImage = determineBaseImage(getJdkVersion(mavenData.getMavenProject()), runtime.getBuildStrategy());
062            builder.setBaseImage(baseImage);
063        }
064        logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Using base image: " + baseImage);
065
066        ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService = new ApplicationConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
067        try {
068            int port = Integer.parseInt(applicationConfigurationService.getServerPort());
069            if (port > 0) {
070                logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Exposing port: " + port);
071                builder.addExposedPort(Port.tcp(port));
072            }
073        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
074            // ignore, can't automatically expose port
075            logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Dynamically resolved port present. Ensure the port is correctly exposed in the <container> configuration. See https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/tree/master/jib-maven-plugin#example for an example.");
076        }
077
078        builder.setPlatforms(Set.of(detectPlatform()));
079
080        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
081            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
082                List<? extends LayerObject> originalLayers = buildPlan.getLayers();
083                builder.setLayers(originalLayers.stream().map(JibMicronautExtension::remapLayer).toList());
084                List<String> cmd = jibConfigurationService.getArgs();
085                if (cmd.isEmpty()) {
086                    cmd = Collections.singletonList("io.micronaut.oraclecloud.function.http.HttpFunction::handleRequest");
087                }
088                builder.setWorkingDirectory(AbsoluteUnixPath.get(jibConfigurationService.getWorkingDirectory().orElse("/function")))
089                        .setEntrypoint(buildProjectFnEntrypoint())
090                        .setCmd(cmd);
091            }
092            case LAMBDA -> {
093                //TODO Leverage AWS Base images:
094                // https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/java-image.html
095                // https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/images-create.html
096                // https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/images-test.html
097                List<String> entrypoint = buildPlan.getEntrypoint();
098                Objects.requireNonNull(entrypoint).set(entrypoint.size() - 1, "io.micronaut.function.aws.runtime.MicronautLambdaRuntime");
099                builder.setEntrypoint(entrypoint);
100            }
101            default -> {
102                //no op
103            }
104        }
105        return builder.build();
106    }
107
108    public static List<String> buildProjectFnEntrypoint() {
109        List<String> entrypoint = new ArrayList<>(9);
110        entrypoint.add("java");
111        entrypoint.add("-XX:-UsePerfData");
112        entrypoint.add("-XX:+UseSerialGC");
113        entrypoint.add("-Xshare:auto");
114        entrypoint.add("-Djava.awt.headless=true");
115        entrypoint.add("-Djava.library.path=/function/runtime/lib");
116        entrypoint.add("-cp");
117        entrypoint.add("/function/app/classes:/function/app/libs/*:/function/app/resources:/function/runtime/*");
118        entrypoint.add("com.fnproject.fn.runtime.EntryPoint");
119        return entrypoint;
120    }
121
122    public static String determineProjectFnVersion(String javaVersion) {
123        int majorVersion = Integer.parseInt(javaVersion.split("\\.")[0]);
124        if (majorVersion <= 21 && majorVersion > 17) {
125            return "21-jre";
126        } else if (majorVersion == 17) {
127            return "17-jre";
128        } else {
129            return LATEST_TAG;
130        }
131    }
132
133    public static String determineBaseImage(String jdkVersion, DockerBuildStrategy buildStrategy) {
134        int javaVersion = Integer.parseInt(jdkVersion);
135        return switch (buildStrategy) {
136            case LAMBDA -> "public.ecr.aws/lambda/java:" + javaVersion;
137            default -> javaVersion == 17 ? DEFAULT_JAVA17_BASE_IMAGE : DEFAULT_JAVA21_BASE_IMAGE;
138        };
139    }
140
141    public static String getJdkVersion(MavenProject project) {
142        return System.getProperty(JDK_VERSION, project.getProperties().getProperty(JDK_VERSION));
143    }
144
145    static LayerObject remapLayer(LayerObject layerObject) {
146        FileEntriesLayer originalLayer = (FileEntriesLayer) layerObject;
147        FileEntriesLayer.Builder builder = FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName(originalLayer.getName());
148        for (FileEntry originalEntry : originalLayer.getEntries()) {
149            builder.addEntry(remapEntry(originalEntry, layerObject.getName()));
150        }
151
152        return builder.build();
153    }
154
155    static FileEntry remapEntry(FileEntry originalEntry, String layerName) {
156        List<String> pathComponents = UnixPathParser.parse(originalEntry.getExtractionPath().toString());
157        AbsoluteUnixPath newPath;
158        if (layerName.contains("dependencies")) {
159            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function/app/libs/" + pathComponents.get(pathComponents.size() - 1));
160        } else {
161            //classes or resources
162            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function" + originalEntry.getExtractionPath());
163        }
164
165        return new FileEntry(originalEntry.getSourceFile(), newPath, originalEntry.getPermissions(),
166                originalEntry.getModificationTime(), originalEntry.getOwnership());
167    }
168
169    private Platform detectPlatform() {
170        String arch = System.getProperty("os.arch").equals("aarch64") ? "arm64" : "amd64";
171        return new Platform(arch, "linux");
172    }
173
174}
